channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Top 10 S&P 500 stock winners since Election Day
item.description: Policy stances from the incoming Trump administration, bullish quarterly earnings and an "Elon Musk premium" led to lofty stock returns, experts said.

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Rises 0.3% To 101.26
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was up 0.3% to 101.26 — up for three consecutive trading days.

item.title: The Score: Target, Super Micro Computer, Alphabet and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: Dow Rises; Dollar Extends Rally
item.description: U.S. stocks settled higher after data showed robust U.S. economic activity in November.

item.title: Snowflake rockets 32%, its best day ever, after earnings beat
item.description: Snowflake reported better-than-expected results on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: Intuit shares drop as quarterly forecast misses estimates due to delayed revenue
item.description: While Intuit reiterated its full-year view, the company said promotional changes in the current quarter will have implications for revenue timing.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Pull Back From 'Frenzied' Rally
item.description: U.S. natural gas retreats after a five-session rally prompted by the arrival of winter temperatures to drive up residential and commercial sector dema...

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
item.description: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
item.description: Front-month gold futures finished the week 5.6% higher, closing at $2,709.09 an ounce. It’s the largest one-week move since March 2023, and snaps a th...

item.title: Gap shares surge as it raises guidance, touts 'strong start' to holiday
item.description: Gap said Old Navy's sales fell after hurricanes led to store closures and warm weather deterred sales in its kids category.
